stanza.l: I have the greatest fun at night,
When casement windows are all bright.
I make believe each one's a square
Of some great quilt up in the air.

l.figLang: The blocks of gold have black between

stanza.l: It surely makes a mammoth quilt —
With bits of dark and checks of gilt —

l.figLang: To cover up the tired day

stanza.l: In such a cozy sort of way.
